title: Calories in Plain Chocolate
meta_description: Discover calories in plain chocolate per 100 g, including carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown with tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Plain milk chocolate (no nuts, fillings, or coatings); standard commercial bar.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cocoa content, milk type, and processing. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of plain chocolate provides ~535 kcal, mostly from fat and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g plain chocolate?
faqs.a: Approximately 535 kcal for plain milk chocolate.

faqs.q: What are the macros in plain chocolate?
faqs.a: Per 100 g: 59 g carbs (52 g sugars), 30 g fat (18 g saturated), 7.5 g protein.

faqs.q: Is plain chocolate high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 52 g sugars per 100 g, mainly from milk and added sugar.

faqs.q: How does dark chocolate compare in calories?
faqs.a: Dark chocolate has fewer calories (~435 kcal per 100 g) due to less sugar and more cocoa.

faqs.q: Does brand affect calories in plain chocolate?
faqs.a: Yes, variations in cocoa, milk, and sweeteners can change values by 50-100 kcal per 100 g.
